attributes.action: Resign Immediately and Publically Apologise For His Partys Disregard For The British People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand the immediate resignation of the unelected Prime Minister Gordon Brown, followed by a public apology from the Labour party on the absolute dereliction of duty to the wellfair and best interests of the British People. At the very least, a prompt general election should be conducted, to allow the British Public their democratic right to choose who leads them through votes and choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
